articles.title: Mumbai weather today: IMD's heavy rain warning, police issue advisory; 'red' alert sounded across Maharashtra | Updates - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The IMD issued a red alert for parts of Maharashtra for July 24 in view of the heavy rainfall lashing the state, especially Mumbai and Thane. | Latest News India
